name: City of Dreams
description: The mission of City of Dreams is to help youth living in low-income neighborhoods build brighter futures through mentorship and youth development. They are guided by a bold vision: to end the generational cycle of poverty in our city's most challenged neighborhoods.
fullDescription: The mission of City of Dreams is to help youth living in low-income neighborhoods build brighter futures through mentorship and youth development. They are guided by a bold vision: to end the generational cycle of poverty in our city's most challenged neighborhoods.
